description: Provides an RDS account privilege resource and used to grant several database some access privilege. A database can be granted by multiple account.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

InstanceId.description: The Id of instance in which account belongs.

Privilege.description:
The privilege of one account access database. Valid values:
- ReadOnly: This value is only for MySQL, MariaDB and SQL Server
- ReadWrite: This value is only for MySQL, MariaDB and SQL Server
- DDLOnly: (Available in 1.64.0+) This value is only for MySQL and MariaDB
- DMLOnly: (Available in 1.64.0+) This value is only for MySQL and MariaDB
- DBOwner: (Available in 1.64.0+) This value is only for SQL Server and PostgreSQL.
